attributes.action: Allow the English to vote on Scottish Independence
attributes.background: The SNP continue to seek independence from England. Let's have a vote which allows English voters to choose whether Scotland should be allowed to leave the union. Vote Yes to expel Scotland from the union and give them independence or vote No to prevent them leaving the union.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is for the people of Scotland to decide their future.

You could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259359
